item.title: Fixing Missing CSS Styles on Cloudflare Pages (Integrity Attribute Issue)
item.description: When deploying a Hugo site (specifically using the Blowfish theme) to Cloudflare Pages, you might encounter an issue where the site loads without any styling (CSS). The browser console often shows an error related to Subresource Integrity (SRI) check failure.
